abstract: Parallels were drawn almost immediately by bloggers and on Twitter, including from the Cain campaign itself.
snippet: Parallels were drawn almost immediately by bloggers and on Twitter, including from the Cain campaign itself.
lead_paragraph: Well, that did not take long. Minutes after news broke Sunday night that Herman Cain had been accused of sexual harassment in the 1990s, comparisons were drawn to Clarence Thomas.

headline.main: In Cain Allegations, Comparisons Are Drawn to Clarence Thomas
